name: Stojo Collapsible Biggie Cup
description: This collapsible cup is suitably for any situation. A heat sleeve protects your hand from hot and cold beverages, and the leak-proof design ensures your drink stays where it should. Once you're finished, just collapse, stow and go.Made of food-grade silicone with a polypropylene lid and heat sleeve.Expands from a packing height of 5cm to hold a generous 473ml of liquid.Leak-proof design lets you slip it in your pocket or pack once you're done.
